articles.title: Explosion rocks building in Palm Springs - KTLA
articles.description: Firefighters responded to a report of an explosion at a reproductive health facility in Palm Springs late Saturday morning. Preliminary information from local media outlets indicated that the explosion occurred at American Reproductive Centers, which is locat…
articles.content:
